documentation.text:
@dev Destroys `tokenId`.
 The approval is cleared when the token is burned.
 Requirements:
 - `tokenId` must exist.
 Emits a {Transfer} event.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)
function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text: Override isApprovedForAll to auto-approve OS's proxy contract
This is used instead of msg.sender as transactions won't be sent by the original token owner, but by OpenSea.

documentation.text: Override isApprovedForAll to auto-approve OS's proxy contract
This is used instead of msg.sender as transactions won't be sent by the original token owner, but by OpenSea.
